examples.example: 我拥有一颗积极向上的心，面对生活的挑战从不退缩。

translate.english: I have a positive heart and never flinch in the face of the challenges of life.

examples.example: 我送给朋友一颗真诚的心，愿我们的友谊天长地久。

translate.english: I give my friend a sincere heart, and wish our friendship lasts forever.

examples.example: 我怀揣着一颗热忱的心，积极投入到工作中。

translate.english: I carry a passionate heart and actively devote myself to the work.
